title: DannyHamilton
author: DannyHamilton
content: Some friends of mine created their own podcast a few years ago. Earlier this year I was invited to participate in a cryptocurrency discussion for a few episodes. Â If you're interested in listening, you can find the conversations here:Boomer and Doomer: Conversations across generationsBoomer and Doomer and the quest to understand cryptoSpotify link: https://open.spotify.com/episode/10zEst6VdDN9xo9thAKn0K?si=yM5dwlVQR0q32UTxLaKWxgBoomer and Doomer Explore Crypto: There and Back again.Spotify link: https://open.spotify.com/episode/6qFS3UygGf3RiynNKY3Bya?si=ED2DmKo2Ti66MHNfqtnRSQBoomer and Doomer Explore Crypto: Bitcoin Strikes BackSpotify link: https://open.spotify.com/episode/4N3dzQAb0B7LYBJZzoV16U?si=6bH6a60OTCCNupBBRxKggQBoomer and Doomer Explore Crypto: The Bitcoin Finale?Spotify link: https://open.spotify.com/episode/0rhtV9SbKkMuBCA728TwfT?si=chonryijTgKXFTdCWjYbdgIf you prefer not to click links or you don't like Spotify, you can search for their podcast on any of several major podcast outlets and then find the conversations using the titles I've posted above.

comments.author: DannyHamilton
comments.body: (This space is reserved to answer questions and provide context/thoughts/commentary/opinions in response to any other posts in this thread.)
